description:

He's one of the few guys I couldn't get to grow back his pubes. As a former body builder he was pretty insistent on keeping himself smooth. So please don't write me- I tried!
Kyle's solo is very confident and leisurely as he felt comfortable showcasing his body and dick. He tops the video with an incredibly explosive cumshot!
title: Kyle - Solo
